industry_trends.description: Platforms like TikTok and Instagram Reels are now the primary discovery tools for new talent
industry_trends.impact: Labels and agencies are prioritizing artists with viral potential over traditional metrics

industry_trends.description: High-profile athletes are increasingly investing in startups (e.g., tech, wellness)
industry_trends.impact: This shifts representation needs from pure endorsements to equity negotiations

industry_trends.description: After the NFT market crash, artists and athletes are focusing on utility-driven digital collectibles (e.g., fan experiences, royalties) rather than speculative assets
industry_trends.impact: Focus shifted to fan experiences and royalties rather than speculative assets

notable_deals.significance: Highest monetary value among all deals in the dataset, representing a significant investment in the electronics sector
Strategic partnership in music endorsement that demonstrates the continued value of artist-brand collaborations in the industry
Innovative partnership in the athleisure sector that could represent a new model for athlete sponsorships
